sourcesContent:
import React, { Fragment } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { AcademicCapIcon, CalendarIcon, ChartBarIcon, ClockIcon, DocumentTextIcon, UserGroupIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline'; const stats = [ { name: 'Current GPA', value: '3.8', change: '+2.5%', changeType: 'positive' }, { name: 'Courses', value: '5', change: '+1', changeType: 'positive' }, { name: 'Upcoming Deadlines', value: '3', change: '-2', changeType: 'negative' }, { name: 'Unread Messages', value: '2', change: '0%', changeType: 'neutral' }, ]; const upcomingClasses = [ { id: 1, name: 'Web Development', time: '09:00 AM - 10:30 AM', location: 'Room 302', instructor: 'Dr. Smith', }, { id: 2, name: 'Database Systems', time: '11:00 AM - 12:30 PM', location: 'Room 205', instructor: 'Prof. Johnson', }, ]; const recentAnnouncements = [ { id: 1, title: 'Campus Reopening Update', preview: 'The campus will reopen on Monday with updated safety protocols...', date: '2 hours ago', }, { id: 2, title: 'New Career Services Portal', preview: 'Check out our new career services portal for job opportunities...', date: '1 day ago', }, ]; const quickLinks = [ { name: 'Course Registration', href: '#', icon: AcademicCapIcon }, { name: 'Academic Calendar', href: '#', icon: CalendarIcon }, { name: 'Library Resources', href: '#', icon: DocumentTextIcon }, { name: 'Student Organizations', href: '#', icon: UserGroupIcon }, ]; export default function Dashboard() { return (

Dashboard

Welcome back, John! Here's what's happening today.

{/* Stats */}
{stats.map((stat) => (

{stat.name}

{stat.value}

{stat.change}
))}
{/* Upcoming Classes */}

Upcoming Classes

View all
    {upcomingClasses.map((classItem) => (

  • {classItem.name}

    {classItem.time}

    {classItem.location} â€¢ {classItem.instructor}

    • ))}
{/* Quick Links */}

Quick Links

{quickLinks.map((item) => ( {item.name} ))}
{/* Recent Announcements */}

Announcements

    {recentAnnouncements.map((announcement) => (

  • {announcement.title}

    {announcement.preview}

    {announcement.date}

    • ))}
  • View all announcements
); }
